name: inventory
description: Manage items within your active container

options.name: add
options.description: Add an item to your active container

options.name: quantity
options.description: Quantity of the item to add. Defaults to 1

options.name: note
options.description: Add a note to the item (max 350 characters).

options.name: put-inside
options.description: Put the added item inside this item, if selected.

options.name: drop
options.description: Drop an item from your active container

options.name: quantity
options.description: Quantity of the item to drop. Defaults to 1

options.name: drop-contents
options.description: If true and item is container, contents will be dropped with item.

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit one or more properties of an item in your active container

options.name: note
options.description: Replace existing note or remove by providing an empty string (max 350 characters).

options.name: move-to-root
options.description: Moves item to root of container. Don't use with 'move-inside' option

options.name: move-inside
options.description: Moves item inside this item. Don't use with 'move-to-root' option
